member.name: DATADIR
member.summary: Specifies the direction of the data flow. This determines the formats that the resulting enumerator can enumerate.

member.name: DATADIR.DATADIR_GET
member.summary: Requests that supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in.

member.name: DATADIR.DATADIR_SET
member.summary: Requests that supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in .
